name: Fill column(s) of number array (arithmetic progression)

controls.name: indexInBlock
controls.caption: First filled column
controls.description: First filled index in every block, 0..blockLength-1

controls.name: lengthInBlock
controls.caption: Number of filled columns
controls.description: Length of filled part in every block; if 0, all array is filled and index above is ignored.

controls.name: replaceColumnRangeInInput
controls.description: Fill the specified columns and return the result; in other case, only filled columns will be returned
controls.caption: Fill the specified columns

controls.name: increment
controls.caption: Increment of value for each block
